item.description:
We will join another group of liberty lovers at Vlora Mediterranean Bar and Restaurant in Back Bay to knock down an attitude adjustment beverage or two. We will have a separate space adjoining the bar and there will be food. As well as American popular standards music. There will be a $6 fee to cover food. (Caution: there might be a few liberals, but then you can work on converting them!)

In addition to RSVPing Yes here, be sure to register at http://hubbub0319.eventbrite.com. That site will process your payment.

Questions? Call me at 781-729-3832 or email me at thurman@efr.bz

Thurman Smith
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the room to the right of the bar
item.name: Afterwork social at Vlora
